properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique identifier for this comment

properties.name: assetType
properties.description: The category of assets on which this comment has been placed, used to locate the service relevant to this comment

properties.name: assetID
properties.description: The unique identifier for the asset against which this comment has been placed

properties.name: poster
properties.description: The user who created this comment

properties.name: posted
properties.description: The time (unix-second timestamp UTC) at which this comment was created

properties.name: topic
properties.description: The topic under which this comment has been assigned

properties.name: requiresAttention
properties.description: If this comment has been marked as 'requiring attention' by another user

properties.name: attendedDate
properties.description: The time (unix-second timestamp UTC) at which this comment was attended to by another user

properties.name: attendedBy
properties.description: The user who attended to this comment to disable the flag

properties.name: body
properties.description: The main content of the comment
